Trade/Device Name(s): Saf-T Closed Blood Collection System® with Saf-T Holder® Device and Male Luer Connector
Saf-T Closed Blood Collection System® with Saf-T Holder® and Saf-T Wing® Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Smiths Medical Saf-T Closed Blood Collection System® devices for syringe blood draw and transfer to vacuum tubes via peripheral IV or safety needle.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to be attached to a peripheral IV catheter for syringe blood draw and transfer to vacuum tubes; use as syringe blood draw and sample transfer device from syringe to vacuum tube.
